login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your account
login.demoPasswordHint: All demo accounts use password: demo123

home.title: Real-Time LMS
home.subtitle: A modern learning management system with real-time chat, live streaming, and interactive quizzes. Perfect for engaging online education experiences.

chat.title: Real-Time Chat
chat.description: Engage in live discussions with instructors and classmates. Share files, ask questions, and collaborate in real-time.

streaming.title: Live Streaming
streaming.description: Attend live lectures and workshops. Interactive video streaming with screen sharing and real-time Q&A.

quiz.title: Interactive Quizzes
quiz.description: Participate in real-time quizzes and assessments. Get instant feedback and track your learning progress.

demo.demoModeFiles: Demo Mode: Files are stored in browser storage (IndexedDB).
demo.demoModeQuiz: Demo Mode: This quiz system works with real-time responses.
demo.demoModeWebRTC: Demo Mode: This WebRTC implementation works with real camera/microphone access.
demo.demoModeChat: Demo Mode: Real-time chat requires backend connection
demo.demoModeLocal: Demo mode: Messages will be simulated locally
demo.demoModeRegistration: Demo Mode: This registration creates a temporary account for testing.

notificationDemo.title: Notification System Demo
notificationDemo.subtitle: Test the real-time notification system by triggering different types of notifications. Check the notification bell in the header to see unread notifications.
notificationDemo.loginRequired: Please log in to test notifications.

chatMessages.title: Chat Messages
chatMessages.description: Simulate receiving a new chat message in a course.

quizStarted.title: Quiz Started
quizStarted.description: Notify students that a new quiz is available.

liveStream.title: Live Stream
liveStream.description: Alert students that instructor started live streaming.

newAssignment.title: New Assignment
newAssignment.description: Notify students of a new assignment posting.

successMessage.title: Success Message
successMessage.description: Show success confirmation for completed actions.

errorMessage.title: Error Message
errorMessage.description: Display error messages with action buttons.
